disabledCommands.description: list of commands to be disabled; to disable p/say, you would add "say" to it.

disableTextCommands.description: whether or not to disable text commands

disableSlashCommands.description: whether or not to disable slash commands

disableDiabolicalEvents.description: whether or not to entirely disable the "diabolical events" such as the random reactions, threads, and replies.

configLockedToServerOwner.cleanname: lock bot configuration to server owner
configLockedToServerOwner.description: whether or not config values can only be changed by the owner of the server. this can obviously only be changed by the owner of the server regardless of it being true or false.

noticesChannelId.description: channel to which pepperbot should send server notices to. notices are generally things like new config options or things server admins should otherwise know about.

diabolicalEventBlacklistedChannelIds.description: list of channel IDs to disable diabolical events within

disableAllCommands.description: whether or not to disable all command usage

blacklistedCommandChannelIds.description: list of channels to disable commands within.

disableGPTResponses.description: whether or not to disable GPT responses

blacklistedGPTResponseChannelIds.description: list of channels to disable GPT responses within.

prefix.description: the prefix used for text commands

useEphemeralReplies.description: whether or not to use ephemeral replies for slash commands

autoCrosspostChannels.description: list of announcement channels that should automatically crosspost/publish their messages to followers

theme.description: the seasonal theme to use for the bot

diabolicalReactionEventChance.description: percentage chance of a diabolical reaction event happening when a message is sent.

diabolicalThreadEventChance.description: percentage chance of a diabolical thread event happening when a message is sent.

diabolicalReplyEventChance.description: percentage chance of a diabolical reply event happening when a message is sent.

enableUntitledClipAnger.description: if enabled untitled medal clips will cause the bot to get angry.
